Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IMMULITE/IMMULITE 1000 and IMMULITE 2000 High Sensitivity CRP assays for quantitative measurement of CRP in serum or plasma
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use with IMMULITE/IMMULITE 1000 or IMMULITE 2000 Analyzer for quantitative measurement of C-Reactive protein (CRP) in serum or plasma to aid detection/evaluation of infection, tissue injury, inflammatory disorders, and assessment of future cardiovascular disease risk including as independent marker for recurrent events in patients with stable coronary disease or acute coronary syndrome
